name: part_012
file: tmp_【＃癒月ちょこ生誕祭2023】ちょこ先生はてぇてぇに囲まれたい【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [r8DrUubFFCQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Choco thanks the viewers and mentions the members-only live stream.

subtitles.original: Ah... Sickbayで待ち合わせ Mistakeなヨカン
subtitles.english: Ah... meeting at the Sickbay, a mistake-like feeling

subtitles.original: 扉開けてさあこっちへおいで
subtitles.english: Open the door and come over here

subtitles.original: 教科書に載っていないこの気持ちは何ですか？
subtitles.english: What is this feeling not written in textbooks?

subtitles.original: 可愛い可愛い顔みせて
subtitles.english: Show me your cute, cute face

subtitles.original: Sickbayで会いましょう Mistakeしちゃう？？
subtitles.english: Let's meet at the Sickbay, will we make a mistake??

subtitles.original: 永遠に続け時間よ止まって
subtitles.english: Continue forever, time please stop

subtitles.original: 教室じゃ見せられない笑顔の秘密は
subtitles.english: The secret of the smile I can't show in the classroom is...

subtitles.original: 甘い甘いお菓子あげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you sweet, sweet candy

subtitles.original: 囁く悪魔の誘惑いかが？
subtitles.english: How about the temptation of a whispering devil?

subtitles.original: 秒針のリズム追い越してく
subtitles.english: Overtaking the rhythm of the second hand

subtitles.original: 聴かせてもっとキミの鼓動
subtitles.english: Let me hear your heartbeat more

subtitles.original: 触れる視線で身体中
subtitles.english: With gazes that touch, throughout my body...

subtitles.original: 騒ぐのもうどうしようもないくらい
subtitles.english: It's so loud, I can't help it

subtitles.original: 禁断の果実甘い もう後に戻れない
subtitles.english: The forbidden fruit is sweet, there's no going back

subtitles.original: 目が合ってはにかんで触れ合って見つめ合って
subtitles.english: Eyes meet, we're shy, we touch, we look at each other

subtitles.original: 永遠の楽園に誘う愛の言葉を
subtitles.english: Love's words that invite us to an eternal paradise

subtitles.original: 耳元で囁いてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll whisper them in your ear

subtitles.original: Sickbayで待ってるわ Mistakeな時間
subtitles.english: Waiting at the Sickbay, a mistake-like time

subtitles.original: 扉閉めてもっと近づいて
subtitles.english: Close the door and come closer

subtitles.original: 神様も止められないこの気持ちの正体を
subtitles.english: The true nature of this feeling that even God can't stop

subtitles.original: 知らないふりはもう出来ない
subtitles.english: I can't pretend not to know anymore

subtitles.original: Sickbayで会いたいの Mistakeしましょう
subtitles.english: I want to meet at the Sickbay, let's make a mistake

subtitles.original: 永遠はここにあるって信じて
subtitles.english: Believe that eternity is right here

subtitles.original: キミにしか見せられない笑顔の裏側
subtitles.english: The other side of the smile I can only show you

subtitles.original: 甘い甘い果実あげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you sweet, sweet fruit

subtitles.original: 囁く悪魔の誘惑もっといかが？
subtitles.english: How about more of the whispering devil's temptation?

subtitles.original: いつでもここで待ってる My Cute student ♡
subtitles.english: Waiting here anytime, My Cute student ♡

subtitles.original: みんな、最後まで見てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for watching until the end!

subtitles.original: この後はメン限ライブもあるので
subtitles.english: After this, there's also a members-only live...

subtitles.original: お楽しみに～！
subtitles.english: So please look forward to it~!
